title: Is ranked harsher this season?
body:
To be clear this isn't a moan its a legit question, is ranked harsher this season?
for one i ended last season as high up the ranking system as i have ever been and was on a 5 winning streak when it reset (during pre-season)
i won more promos than i ever have, and got ranked the lowest i have ever been, and most of my friends have similar stories this season,
also it used to be that you lost less LP than you gained so that even if you went 50/50 you still moved up a bit, yet i have been losing just as much if not more LP per loss than i have ben gaining per win, i was just wondering if ranked has been made a bit harder to move up this season or if I'm just having a run of bad luck. thanks, an official response from Riot would be much appreciated to put this question to rest. :)

replies.body: What it is, is it's dropped a lot of people's MMR's, if your going 50/50 and your still losing LP then you have a lower MMR then your division requires.
wouldn't it be the opposite? you should be getting more MMR for going 50/50 in a higher division that you are worth?
When your losing LP (as in if you win and lose one, you have lost LP overall) it means your MMR is lower then your division.
ok so what do i need to do to change that?
Win more then you lose, it's as simple as that.
so the whole "50/50 will slowly move you up" is bs then?

50/50 will slowly move your MMR up, but it'd be very slow, getting about 60/40 will make it move decently.

And as always win streaks affect your MMR more then win then loss then win.
no. i got back to where i was in like 1-2 days.
